message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.LG, cs.SI

This paper is primarily focused on the security aspects of smart contracts and proposes a new approach for detecting vulnerabilities. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also involves software engineering aspects such as code matching and detection rules, which makes cs.SE (Software Engineering) another likely sub-category. The paper deals with programming languages and code analysis, which makes cs.PL (Programming Languages) another possible sub-category. The paper also involves machine learning techniques for matching abstract vulnerability signatures, which makes cs.LG (Machine Learning) another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper involves the use of various defense mechanisms, which makes cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) another possible sub-category.
